hours_text:
[  
](https://www.google.com/maps/search/volcano+art+center/@19.4258522,-155.239547,15z/data=!3m1!4b1 "Google Map Directions")We look forward to hearing from you! How would you like to contact us?

By mail:  
Volcano Art Center  
P.O. Box 129  
Volcano, HI 96785

By phone:  
**Main Gallery** in Hawai‘i Volcanoes National Park (Open Daily from 9am – 5pm): 808-967-7565

**Niaulani Campus Administration Office & gallery** in Volcano Village (Open Monday – Friday, from 10am – 4pm) (Closed Saturday & Sunday): 808-967-8222

OR

Fill out the form below and we’ll get back to you shortly:

  * Name*

First Last

  * Email*

  * Phone

  * Message:*

  * CAPTCHA

Δ

**Having a PayPal account is not necessary – Simply choose the option to pay with a debit or credit card.  
If you would rather purchase your ticket by phone call (808) 967-8222.
